BIO

Analyzed software issues like portal logins or other company related sites to ensure all employees would be able to perform their duties. Informed all employees of necessary downtimes to reduce the amount of phone calls and tickets. Logged tickets for every issue that was reported to the department and responded to each issue depending on priority. Administered training for new hires on all technology policies and procedures of the department.
